title: Continuing Controversy
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss their thoughts on todays developments on the Kyrie Irving controversy, what the impact of the Astros no-hitter in Game 4 last night is and Steve Young joins the show for 5 Good Minutes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Kyrie Irving's controversy continues and the Astros throw a combined no-hitter in Game 4.
